channel.title: RadialWalkTol
channel.description: i have tried using RadialRoadWalk with the default "RoadColor", but it doesent do what i tell it to, so i was wondering if somebody could make a procedure of normal RadialWalk, but with color Tolerance :P

item.title: RadialWalkTol
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

You posted the same exact post at villu, and you got your answer.
Quote from Dankness at villu.

Dankness;51727:

You wont be able to walk a RoadColor for very long w/ a Tolerance. Before RadialRoadWalk was created we tryd using just a RadialTolWalk and you get lost everytime, There purposely too many colors that fall into the same tolerance as the RoadColor just to confuse color clickers.

Read full topic
